column4: Someone PLEASE help me install printer drivers...i'm in a huge rush and its finals :(
i have the files downloaded, but i dont know how to install them yet
: What kind of files are they?
I literally timed Ubuntu's copying portion of the install. It was like literally, 18 minutes on my rig.
run xterm or gnome-terminal via the run box (alt+f2 default)
: do you know your way around the terminal? (e.g. moving to the correct folder)
because eventually you wanna run alien on that RPM file.
: What kind of printer do you have?
it doesn't auto-detect it, naoise? brb
it does, but it doesn't have the proper model number
